context: nd the types of node in each layer.6 Some neural network architectures are explicitly designed to generalize well on particular types of data: convolutional networks encode the idea that the same feature extractor is useful at all locations across a spatial grid, and recurrent networks encode the idea that the same update rule is useful at all points in a stream of sequential data.
